summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2000 HOLIDAY RAMBLER VACATIONER. THE CONTACT RECEIVED THE RECALL NOTICE ASSOCIATED WITH NHTSA RECALL CAMPAIGN ID NUMBER 02V237000 (STRUCTURE) AND WAS ATTEMPTING TO HAVE THE VEHICLE REPAIRED FOR THE PAST THREE YEARS. THE CONTACT WAS CONSTANTLY INFORMED BY DEALERS THAT THE JOB WAS TOO BIG FOR THEM TO PERFORM. THE CONTACT WORKED WITH THE MANUFACTURER TO FIND A LOCATION CAPABLE OF PERFORMING THE REPAIRS, BUT THE MANUFACTURER STATED THAT THE RECALL EXPIRED. THE RECALL WAS ISSUED AUGUST 13, 2002 AND WAS STILL WITHIN THE TEN YEAR WINDOW. THE CURRENT MILEAGE WAS 12,500.   UPDATED 9/13/11 *CN  UPDATED 10/05/11
